definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: dim, dull, faint; only f. [[כֵּהָה]] Le 13:6 + 6 t.; pl. [[כֵּהוֹת]] Le 13:39, 1Sa 3:2; —dim, of eyes 1Sa 3:2; of burning wick (´[[כִּשְׁתָּה כ]]) Is 42:3; dull (in colour, of plague-spots) Le 13:6, Le 13:21, Le 13:26, Le 13:39, Le 13:56; fig. = faint ´[[רוּחַ כ]] Is 61:3 (opp. [[מַעֲטֵה תְהִלָּה]]).
